msg: Remove Impact as an alternative for web UI title font. Closes #12.

author: benh
msg: make etags; Now creates src/TAGS for all C/CPP code

author: benh
msg: On Mac OS X the implementation of inet_ntoa is not thread-safe (POSIX doesn't require it to be thread safe) and this can cause a bug (you'll get a string representation of a PID with '[inet_ntoa error]').

author: benh
msg: Temporary fix for infinite loop caused by the error callback calling stop, calling the error callback (nexusproject/nexus#14).
